references.reason: This paper details the Qwen2.5-VL model, which is the architecture the current work builds upon.

references.paper_title: Videollm-online: Online video large language model for streaming video
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of online video large language models for streaming video processing, a core topic in the current paper.

references.paper_title: OVO-Bench: How Far is Your Video-LLMs from Real-World Online Video Understanding?
references.reason: This paper introduces the OVO-Bench benchmark, used to evaluate the performance of the proposed model.

references.paper_title: StreamingBench: Assessing the Gap for MLLMs to Achieve Streaming Video Understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces the StreamingBench benchmark, used to evaluate the performance of the proposed model.
This paper serves as a foundational language model architecture being utilized in this research.
